info.author: Eugene Kaznacheev, Joshua Tasker
info.description:
This module provides a Python wrapper around the Yahoo! Weather, Weather.com,
and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) APIs. Fetch
weather reports using zip code, location id, city name, state, country, etc.
info.name: pywapi
info.summary: Python wrapper around different weather APIs
info.html_description: This module provides a Python wrapper around the Yahoo! Weather, Weather.com, and National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) APIs. Fetch weather reports using zip code, location id, city name, state, country, etc.
